function.title: Organization
function.description: Add organizations in the metadata registry

function.title: Context
function.description: Create a new context a partition in the registry in which data elements may be named differently

function.title: Conceptual Domain
function.description: Create a new conceptual domain and add/edit value domains.

function.title: Object Class
function.description: Create a new object class - a concept or concept expression - describing an real world object whose properties can be measured by data elements within this metadata repository

function.title: Property
function.description: Create a new property describing attributes or properties of real world objects that can be measured by data elements within this metadata repository

function.title: Value Domain
function.description: Create a new value domain and add/edit permissable values

function.title: Data Element Concept
function.description: Create a data element concept, object class, and property and associate it with a conceptual domain

function.title: Data Element
function.description: Create a detailed data element by associating a data element concept and a value domain

function.title: Reference Document
function.description: Import a .PDF or .DOC into the metadata repository and create a curation record so that it can be referred to by administered items

function.title: Concept Relationship
function.description: Create a new concept relationship - a concept relationship joins 2 or more concepts together by some relationship

function.title: Datatypes
function.description: View and maintain the datatypes available to the curators of this metadata repository

function.title: Organizations
function.description: Mangage organisations in the metadata registry

function.title: Units of Measure
function.description: View and maintain the units of measure available to the curators of this metadata repository

function.title: Report on Broken Links
function.description: Reports on broken links in the metadata registry

function.title: Report on duplicate IDs
function.description: List and link to documents with duplicate identifiers. This report takes several minutes to complete...

function.title: Report on inconsistent IDs
function.description: List and link to documents with inconsistent identifiers and names

function.title: Schema
function.description: Generate an XML Schema of the registry
